frame.name: Manner_of_life
frame.definition:
<def-root>An <fen>Experiencer</fen> actualizes a certain pattern of behavior, a <fen>Lifestyle</fen>, which persists for a significant period of time in the <fen>Experiencer</fen>'s life and is recognized as part of his character or normal routine. The <fen>Lifestyle</fen> is not necessarily realized intentionally, and may just be the result of circumstance.
<ex><fex name="Experiencer">He</fex> <t>lived</t> <fex name="Lifestyle">a hedonistic life</fex> <fex name="Time">before he settled down</fex>.</ex> <ex><fex name="Time">When she graduated</fex>, <fex name="Experiencer">she</fex> had to <t>live</t> <fex name="Degree">extremeley</fex> <fex name="Manner">frugally</fex> because there were no jobs.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Experiencer
FE.definition:
<def-root>The person who actualizes a pattern of behavior.
<ex><fex name="Experiencer">John</fex> was <t>living</t> the dream.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Lifestyle
FE.definition:
<def-root>A pattern of behavior which the actions of the <fen>Experiencer</fen> matches for a significant period of time.
<ex>He <t>lived</t> <fex name="Lifestyle">the life of a beggar</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Manner
FE.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Lifestyle</fen> may be characterized by a <fen>Manner</fen>, which is often expressed adverbially.
<ex>He <t>lived</t> <fex name="Manner">dangerously</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Time
FE.definition:
<def-root>A temporal description of when the <fen>Experiencer</fen> adopts a <fen>Lifestyle</fen>.
</def-root>

FE.name: Degree
FE.definition:
<def-root>The degree to which the <fen>Experiencer</fen> is carrying out the expected patterns of behavior of the <fen>Lifestyle</fen>.
<ex>Jeremy is <t>living</t> <fex name="Degree">very</fex> adventurously these days.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Place
FE.definition: <def-root>The spatial location where the <fen>Experiencer</fen> carries out a <fen>Lifestyle</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Domain
FE.definition: <def-root>The general category under which the <fen>Lifestyle</fen> can be categorized.</def-root>

FE.name: Descriptor
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE covers characterizations of the <fen>Lifestyle</fen> that are not covered by other frame elements.</def-root>
